title: Infected Connection
description: While investigating a fault plaguing the newest model of smartphone, stressed technician Simon Parfitt makes a disturbing discovery. Incubating inside the batteries are spider-like creatures, and the phenomenon seems to be spreading.But when Simon tries to alert the authorities, it becomes clear that someone wants him dead.As paranoia sets in, Simon is reluctantly recruited in the fight against an enemy that is always several steps ahead.
